meanings.definition: The production of living organisms from other living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Biogenesis is when new plants grow from existing seeds.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study biogenesis to understand how animals reproduce.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was filled with laughter as the students learned about biogenesis.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, biogenesis is the constant cycle of growth and renewal.
meanings.sent5: The miracle of biogenesis is evident in the birth of every living being.

meanings.definition: The theory that living organisms arise from preexisting living matter.
meanings.sent1: Biogenesis explains how cells divide and multiply to form new organisms.
meanings.sent2: The concept of biogenesis has revolutionized our understanding of biology.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the idea of biogenesis creating a world of living toys.
meanings.sent4: In the story of evolution, biogenesis is the first chapter of life's grand narrative.
meanings.sent5: The classroom buzzed with excitement as the teacher introduced the concept of biogenesis.
